entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: Harry's Firebolt is mentioned as something he cannot give to Cho because Umbridge has it. The Firebolt is also referred to in a dream sequence where Harry is gliding on his belly.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as someone Harry would not give the Firebolt to.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge has possession of the Firebolt and is mentioned in the context of why Harry cannot give it to Cho.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby's head is used as a shape for Christmas baubles that Harry puts up in the D.A. room.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned throughout the passage as the protagonist.

relationships.description: Umbridge has possession of Harry's Firebolt.
Harry is considering giving the Firebolt to Cho, but decides not to because Umbridge has it.
